thread.title: FC Köln not losing many sleepless nights over ‘transfer poker’ with Chelsea
thread.title_full: FC Köln not losing many sleepless nights over ‘transfer poker’ with Chelsea

author: David Pasztor
title: FC Köln not losing many sleepless nights over ‘transfer poker’ with Chelsea
text: FC Köln not losing many sleepless nights over ‘transfer poker’ with Chelsea Jonas Hector’s time in the rumor mill has gone almost as quickly as it arrived. Photo by Matthias Hangst/Getty Images Jonas Hector-to-Chelsea rumor, we hardly knew ya. Just 24 hours after reappearing in the Chelsea rumor mill on the back of a Times report, it’s already on its way out, thanks to the reaction to those rumors from Hector’s club 1. FC Köln themselves. Head coach Peter Stöger revealed that he’s losing a grand total of zero sleepless nights over what Bild are calling a bit of “transfer poker”. We’ve got him right where we want him, boys! Go for the jugular! Re-raise! “I will not have sleepless nights.” -Peter Stöger; source: Bild via Metro Meanwhile, “unimpressed” sporting director Jörg Schmadtke took a more pragmatic view. “And we want Kurt Zouma from Chelsea, a class central defender. Unfortunately we can not get him.” -Jörg Schmadtke; source: Express via Google Translate No, you may not. We do have John Terry available on loan, possibly, would that interest you maybe? So yeah, that was fun for a minute, to be speculatively linked with a proper wing-back. Back to extolling the merits of Aké, Pedro, or Kenedy as Alonso’s backups then...
